ROW.NAME: 县区局查补台帐明细表
录入人
ROW.SQLWHE: deptid like (select decode(scope,'ALL','%',substr('[%SYS_DEPTID]',0,7 )||'%') from v_depts where id='[%SYS_DEPTID]')

ROW.DATDSC: select USRID,USRNAM,OWNER,HY,ZZS,SDS,ZNJ,FK,QT,SDDAT,RKDAT,BILNO,RES,NOTE from( select substr(swjg_dm,0,7) swjg,USRID,USRNAM,OWNER,HY,ZZS,SDS,ZNJ,FK,QT,SDDAT,RKDAT,BILNO,RES,NOTE from TAX_PSDTL a,tax_pshdr b ,v_tax_company c where (usrid like '%[%CMID]%' or usrnam like '%[%CMID]%') and rkdat>=decode('[%RKDAT1]','','0','[%RKDAT1]') and rkdat<=decode('[%RKDAT2]','','9999999999','[%RKDAT2]') and a.bilid=b.bilid(+) and a.usrid=c.id(+) and b.crtusr like decode('[%CRTUSR]',' ','','[%CRTUSR]')||'%' order by RKDAT,USRID ) where [%SWJGSTR] --swjg like '[%SWJG]%'
